NotFound.It seems you took a wrong turn: It seems you took a wrong turn...
NotFound.This page was lost in the sands of Karak: This page was lost in the sands of Karakalpakstan or was just a mirage.

ErrorPage.title: We have a small breakdown on the way
ErrorPage.desc: Our servers may have overheated slightly in the sun or been caught in a sandstorm. We're working on fixes. Please try refreshing the page in a minute

Product.The price depends on the number of peopl: *The price depends on the number of people in the group
Product.Be sure to wear comfortable closed-toe s: Be sure to wear comfortable closed-toe shoes (sneakers), a hat, and sunglasses. It can get chilly in the desert at night, so bring a warm sweater or windbreaker.
Product.Theres: There's no mobile phone service or internet access on the Ustyurt plateau or by the sea. This is a great opportunity for a Digital Detox!
Product.Part of the route (about 100 km) is off-: Part of the route (about 100 km) is off-road. The jeeps are reliable, but be prepared for a real adventure.
